description.en: Suddenly a high school student Subaru Natsuki has been summoned to another world on the way back from the convenience store. With the biggest crisis of his life being summoned to another world and no sign of the one who summoned him things become worse when he is attacked. But when he is saved by a mysterious silver-haired girl with a fairy cat, Subaru co-operates with the girl to return the favor. When they finally manage to get a clue Subaru and the girl are attacked and killed by someone. Subaru then awakens in the place he was summoned and notices the ability he gained "Returns by Death" a helpless boy that only has the ability to rewind time by dying. And beyond the despair can he save the girl from the fate of death!
description.ru: После спасения жизни Эмилии и возвращения ей инсигнии, Нацуки Субару был приглашен в особняк к лорду, где живет Эмилия. Нацуки устраивается на работу дворецким, и всё идёт хорошо, но вот только спустя несколько дней обнаруживается, что он опять откатился назад во времени, на момент, когда он только появился в особняке. Кто же в этот раз замочил бедного Нацуки?
description.pt-br: O estudante do ensino médio Natsuki Subaru foi convocado para um mundo de fantasia, enquanto estava nocaminho para casa vindo de uma loja de conveniência! Com base em seu conhecimento de histórias onde as pessoas são transportados para outros mundos, ele assumiu que ele deve ter algum tipo de super poder, mas essa suposição acabou deixando ele espancadoe quase morto durante um assalto. Ele é resgatado por uma meio-elfo, Satera, e seu companheiro, um gato mágico pequeno chamado Puck. Eles estão procurando por algo que foi roubado dela, e Subaru decide ajudar. No entanto, muito em breve, ele descobre que ele de fato tem uma habilidade especial. Quando ele morre, ele começa sua aventura novamente a partir do momento em que ele foi convocado para o mundo de fantasia. Será que ele vai ser capaz de usar sua habilidade para ajudar Satera?

description.en:
After having descended upon this world, the gods have created guilds where adventurers can test their mettle. These guilds, known as "familia," grant adventurers the chance to explore, gather, hunt, or simply enjoy themselves.  
Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka Gaiden: Sword Oratoria begins in Orario, the lively city of adventurers. The Sword Princess, Ais Wallenstein, and the novice mage, Lefiya Viridis, are members of the Loki Familia, who are experts at monster hunting. With the rest of their group, they journey to the tower of Babel in hopes of exploring the dungeon underneath. Home to powerful monsters, the dungeon will fulfill Ais's desire to master her sword skills, while bringing Lefiya closer to her dream of succeeding Riveria Ljos Alf, vice-captain of the Loki Familia, as the most powerful mage in the land.

---

**Links:**
[Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/is-it-wrong-to-try-to-pick-up-girls-in-a-dungeon-on-the-side-sword-oratoria-manga)

description.en:
Bell Cranel is just trying to find his way in the world. Of course, in his case, the “world” is an enormous dungeon filled with monsters below a city run by gods and goddesses with way too much time on their hands. He’s got big dreams but not much more when a roll on the random encounter die brings him face-to-face with the girl of his dreams—but what’s an amateur adventurer got to offer a brilliant swords woman? And what if the lonely goddess who sponsors his solo adventuring gets jealous?

(Series was cancelled in 2018 for an unknown reason and restarted in 2020 under a sequel title.)
description.ru: Огромный город Орарио - всего лишь вход в подземный лабиринт, широко известный как "Подземелье". Люди приходят туда за славой, честью, приходят, надеясь получить все то, что захотят. И именно здесь парень, мечтающий стать авантюристом, знакомится с маленькой богиней, не нашедшей ни одного последователя.

altTitles.ja: 宝石の国

altTitles.en: LOTL

description.ar: في المستقبل البعيد ، يولد شكل جديد من أشكال الحياة يسمى Houseki (الجواهر). يجب على الجواهر الـ 28  القتال ضد القمريين الذين يرغبون في مهاجمتهم وتحويلهم إلى زينة ، وبالتالي يتم تعيين كل جوهرة دور مثل مقاتل أو مسعف. على الرغم من أنهم يأملون في محاربة القمريين ، إلا أن فوس  عبارة عن جوهرة لم يتم منحها أي مهمة حتى يطلب منه المعلم الجواهر كونغو كتابة موسوعة.
description.az: Cəvahiratlar ölkəsi (Houseki no Kuni), meteoritlərin altı dəfə Yerə düşdüyü və bu prosesdə onu məhv etdiyi uzaq gələcəkdə baş verir. Demək olar ki, bütün canlılar məhv oldu, qalan bütün torpaqlar tək bir sahilə çevrildi. Çox uzun zaman dilimləri ərzində həsas həyat forması olan yeni bir irq yarandı; insan şəklini alan ölməz zinət əşyaları. Fosfofillit (Phos) zəifdir (ən aşağı sərtliklərdən birinə malikdir) və həmyaşıdları tərəfindən yararsız hesab edilir. Phos'a təbiət tarixinin ensiklopediyasını yaratmaq tapşırığı verildikdən sonra o, uzaq, lakin müdrik həmkarı Kinovarın (Cinnabar) köməyinə müraciət edir, beləliklə onların dostluğu və şəxsi inkişafı başlayır. Eyni zamanda “Cəvahirat camaatı” onun dəbdəbəli dəyərindən yararlanmaq istəyən Aydan gələnlərlə (aylılarla) müharibə aparır.
description.en: In the distant future, a new life form called The Lustrous are born. The 28 Lustrous must fight against the Lunarians who want to attack them and turn them into decorations, thus each Lustrous is assigned a role such as a fighter or a medic. Though they hope to fight the Lunarians, Phos is a Lustrous who is given no assignment until the Lustrous' master Adamantine asks them to write an encyclopedia.
description.ru: Далёкое будущее. После серии катаклизмов Земля окружена шестью лунами и почти полностью покрыта океаном. На крохотном островке суши обитают 28 представителей новой расы - самоцветов. Но и они вынуждены непрерывно бороться за существование с обитателями лун. Это история сильных, хрупких и красивых созданий.
description.uk: У далекому майбутньому народжується нова форма життя, яку називають самоцвітами. 28 самоцвітів повинні боротися проти лунаріанців, які хочуть напасти на них і перетворити на прикраси, тому кожному самоцвіту призначена роль бійця або медика. Фос - одна з самоцвітів, яка сподівається боротися з лунаріанцями, але їй не дають жодних завдань, доки майстер самоцвітів Адамантін не просить її написати енциклопедію.

description.ar: في الشرق العظيم ، تقع قاره عظيمه تسمى رودينوس في يوم ما ، وصل جسم طائر مجهول في المجال الجوي لمقاطعة كوا-توين ، الجسم الطائر المجهول كان معارضا لجو المقاطعة الاعتيادي ، فلم تتقبله المقاطعة ، لكن كان هذا الجسم الطائر مجرد نذير لشيء اكثر صدمة بعيدًا عن البحر الشرقي ، ظهرت فجاه مجموعة من الجزر ، تسمي نفسها دولة اليابان وفقا لهم ، تم نقل أمتهم الى عالم آخر والآن يجدون انفسهم منفصلين عن عالمهم القديم ويجب عليهم البقاء على قيد الحياة في العالم الجديد ، كيف ستتفاعل اليابان مع البلدان الاصليه في العالم الجديد؟ هل سيرحبون بها كصديقه ام كعدو؟ هذه قصه الدوله التي تسمى باليابان التي تغرق في عاصفه فوضويه في العالم
description.en:
In the Great Orient, lies a continent called Rodenius. One day, an unidentified flying object arrived at Qua-Toyne Principality’s airspace. 
That UFO defied the Principality’s common sense, but it was just a harbinger of something even more shocking.  
  
Far to the eastern sea, a group of islands suddenly appeared. The country of the islands called itself: Japan.
According to them, their nation had been transported to another world.  
  
Now finding themselves separated from their old world and must survive in the new one, how will Japan interact with the native countries of this world? Will they greet it as a friend or as an enemy?  
  
This is a story of the country called Japan as it was engulfed in the chaotic storm of this new world.

title.en: Koushaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta node, Mental Otome na Ore wa, Zenryoku de Onnanoko wo Tanoshimimasu

altTitles.ja: 公爵令嬢に転生してしまったので、メンタル乙女な俺は、全力で女の子を楽しみます

altTitles.en: Since I Have Been Reincarnated as the Daughter of a Duke, I, the "Girl Inside," Will Enjoy Being a Girl as Much as I Can!

description.en:
A humble man in his twenties suddenly dies and is reborn as the daughter of a duke in an 18th-century lookalike world where magic exists!
He is now living a second life as the adorable "Miranda Mirandiehl," who looks like a doll.
As he was always a "girl inside" with girlish interests, he accepted his reincarnation surprisingly easily.
And so, after being reborn as Miranda, he will enjoy his new life to the fullest!
What kind of encounters await him, and what lies ahead in his gender-swapped otherworldly reincarnation life?

A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

_____________

description.pl: Mangowa adaptacja powieści napisanej przez Maruto Fumiaki. Twórcą tej adaptacji jest Yom, mangaka z Ganbare, Douki-chan.

title.en: The Vampire's Plans to Die in Peace

altTitles.en: The Villainess Wants to Die Gracefully

description.en:
Wanting to die, she jumped off the bridge and became a vampire who lived forever. The strongest vampire who appears as the villain in the novel.

'Are you kidding?'

No, wait? Wouldn't it be easier and quicker to die if I pave a flower path for the vampire hunter, the male lead?
First, let's start with the ruined male lead's family.
Spending too much time and money, she saved the male lead's family who was demoted to peasants. At this point, will the male lead grow well?

“Fred… Please come out.”

Then, a 10-year-old male lead became a reclusive loner.

'Why? …?' Please let me die soon!

She became a teacher to the original male lead and a supporter to the original female lead.
I accidentally turned a dying boy into a family member and saved him, but that wouldn't be a big deal. Then I fell asleep for a while and woke up, and 10 years had passed. At this point, I thought I could go to die soon, so I appeared in front of the original characters.

"Teacher. I don't care if you are a monster. So please, stay by my side again.”
“I don't believe in God. The only thing I trust is Unnie who raised me up to this point.”
…Why are they here?
“I made him live as he pleases, he made himself a vampire at his will, and made him tangled up in you, are you going to throw it away now? To what extent are you going to make me miserable?”

Even the kid from the purebred family has changed.
“So you too. Everything you want is in my hands.”

What the hell happened in 10 years?
description.ru:
Решив покончить жизнь самоубийством, главная героиня по иронии судьбы вдруг оказывается в совершенно другом мире и она... вампир? Даже если с этим ещё можно смириться, но с тем, что она теперь и бессмертная?! Полный провал.
Другой мир — вселенная новеллы, а сама героиня — главная злодейка! Ну и за что ей это наказание?.. Попытки умереть вновь не увенчались успехом... Но, может, Охотники на вампиров помогут ей уйти в мир иной? А ещё лучше, если она сама воспитает своего собственного убийцу из древнего рода Шеффелов..

description.en: Having started from the bottom and worked his way to the top, Hyeonwoo finds himself betrayed by the royal family of Soonyang Group, the largest corporation in South Korea, after providing 13 years of dedicated service. Just when he thinks all his efforts have been made in vain and prepares to embrace his death, he suddenly wakes up in the body of Dojun Jin, the youngest grandson to the founder and CEO of Soonyang, having traveled back in time. Having been granted this second chance, Hyeonwoo begins to lay the foundation for his revenge against his evil relatives.

altTitles.ja: あかいろ交差点

description.en:
Is being unable to see the red string of fate better?!  
Since the encounter on the day of the high school entrance ceremony, dog-like boy, Makita Keita and cat-like girl, Ohara Tamaki have had the worst relationship.  
The story starts to progress when the both of them are put in the same class.  
A little mysterious heart racing school youth graffiti begins!
description.es: El timido y amigable Keita trata de mejorar su amistad con Tamaki, que siempre se ha mostrado fria y cruel desde la primera vez que se conocieron. ¿Pero por qué? Keita quiere saber… ¿Será que lo odia? ¿Hizo algo que la lastimó? Eso pensaba Keita, hasta que Tamaki le dijo que podia ver algo especial…

description.ar: إنني أهدف إلى أن أكون مثل موظفة الاستقبال الأولى لهاري في هار! في عالم مليء بالسحر ، منذ صغرها ، أرادت ناناري دائمًا أن تكون موظف ةاستقبال في هار ، تمامًا مثل سان أني. أخبرها والداها أنها لا يمكن أن تصبح واحدة إلا إذا التحقت في أكاديمية المملكة السحرية وأصبحت من مستخدمي السحر من الدرجة الأولى. ومع ذلك ، عندما تصل إلى هناك ، فإنها محاطة بالملوك والنبلاء. ناناري مصممة على أن تكون الأفضل بين كل عامة الناس! لكن الأمير الذي يجلس بجانبها هو دائما في طريقها! بعد التخرج ، أصبحت ناناري موظف استقبال في جامعة هار ، ولكن كل يوم أصبح محمومًا أكثر مما اعتقدت في البداية! علاوة على ذلك ، فإن هذا الأمير المزعج الذي أزعجها باستمرار قد وجد وظيفة و…
description.de:
Ich möchte die beste Rezeptionistin in ganz Haare sein!

In einer Welt gefüllt mit Magie möchte Nanari seit ihrer Kindheit eine Rezeptionistin in Haare sein, genau wie die Onee-san. Ihre Eltern warnten sie, dass nur die Besten der Magie-Akademie dazu die Chance bekämen. Doch als sie auf der Akademie ist, ist sie umgeben von Adel. Nanari hat ihr Ziel jedoch nicht aus den Augen verloren, doch der Prinz, der neben ihr sitzt, kreuzt ständig ihren Weg!

---

[Official English Light Novel Translation](https://j-novel.club/s/the-sorcerer-s-receptionist)  
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2056dv/)
description.en:
I'm aiming to be like Haare's number one receptionist onee-san!

In a world filled with magic, from a young age, Nanari has always wanted to be a receptionist at Haare, just like that onee-san. Her parents told her she couldn't become one unless she enrolled in the kingdom's magic academy and became a top-class magic user. However, when she gets there she's surrounded by royalty and nobility. Nanari is determined to be the best amongst all the commoners! But the prince who sits beside her is always getting in her way!

After graduating, Nanari successfully became a receptionist at Haare, but each day is far more hectic than what she originally thought would be! On top of all this, that annoying prince who continuously bothered her has found a job and…?

---

[Official English Light Novel Translation](https://j-novel.club/s/the-sorcerer-s-receptionist)  
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2056dv/)
description.vi: “Tôi sẽ trở thành tiếp tân giống như chị ấy!”. Trong một thế giới đầy ma thuật, từ nhỏ, Nanaly luôn muốn trở thành nhân viên tiếp tân tại Harle, giống như chị gái mà cô hằng ngưỡng mộ. Cha mẹ cô nói với cô rằng cô không thể trở thành tiếp tân trừ khi cô đăng ký vào học viện ma thuật của vương quốc và trở thành người sử dụng ma thuật hàng đầu. Tuy nhiên, khi cô đến đó, xung quanh cô luôn bao quanh bởi hoàng gia và quý tộc. Nanaly được xác định là người tốt nhất trong số tất cả những người bình thường! Nhưng tên đầu vàng ngồi bên cạnh lại luôn cản đường cô! Sau khi tốt nghiệp, Nanaly đã hoàn thành ước mơ trở thành tiếp tân ở Harle, nhưng mỗi ngày lại bận rộn hơn nhiều so với những gì cô nghĩ ban đầu! Trên hết, cái tên đầu vàng phiền phức, người liên tục làm phiền cô đã tìm được việc làm và…??

description.en: I treated you like a brother, but you treated me like a love rival! You stole every girlfriend I ever had! I just wanted to get married and have a baby, why is that so difficult?! A black-hearted white lotus vs. straight guy. A wild omegaverse fantasy,  that's both sweet and seductive~~

altTitles.ja: Tsue to Tsurugi no Wistoria
杖と剣のウィストリア

description.en: The new, magical dungeon-adventure fantasy series from the author of Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Seeking to fulfill a promise to a childhood friend, Will Serfort enters Regarden Magical Academy with the goal of making it to the top of the magical world. There’s just one problem: he can’t use magic! Will his sword skills be the key to unlocking his true potential?
description.pt-br: A nova série de fantasia mágica e de aventura em masmorras do autor de "É Errado Tentar Pegar Garotas em um Calabouço?" segue a jornada de Will Serfort. Buscando cumprir uma promessa feita a uma amiga de infância, Will ingressa na Academia Mágica de Regarden com o objetivo de alcançar o topo do mundo mágico. Mas há um problema: ele não pode usar magia! Serão suas habilidades com a espada a chave para desbloquear seu verdadeiro potencial?

altTitles.ja: Yaiteru Futari

altTitles.ru: Брак с Нуля: Как Поджарить Нашу Любовь

altTitles.ja: 焼いてるふたり

altTitles.th: จุดรักเราด้วยเตาถ่าน

description.en: After their fateful encounter through a dating app, Kenta and Chihiro decided to get married with zero days of dating in light of Kenta’s transfer. As a couple who got married without knowing much about each other, they deepen their relationship through their regular weekend BBQs.
description.ja:
マッチングアプリで運命の出会いを果たした、健太と千尋。奥手すぎて最初の一歩を踏み出せずにいるふたりが、健太の浜松への転勤をきっかけに急進展。なんと…交際ゼロ日で結婚することに！　

お互いをよく知らないまま夫婦になったふたりは、毎週末のBBQでじっくり仲を深めていく――。
description.ru: После роковой встречи через приложение для знакомств, Кента и Чихиро решили пожениться с нулевым количеством дней знакомств в свете перевода Кенты. Как пара, которая вышла замуж, не зная многого друг о друге, они развивают свои отношения путём регулярных выходных с барбекю.
description.pt-br: Quando Kenta, de 30 anos, conhece a designer gráfica Chihiro, ele queima seu exterior descolado com sua paixão por churrasco! Agora, após um lampejo de namoro, eles são recém-casados! Embora seus empregos os mantenham separados, eles ainda têm fins de semana juntos para grelhar, e carne boa não é a única coisa que está esquentando neste relacionamento escaldante!

description.en: Your typical NTR story

Wu Ruo couldn't see the true colors of the people around him until the day he died. The family of the friends who he treasured had been using him, and the husband who he neglected was the one who rescued him in the last moments. God's mercy allowed him to be reborn, reborn into his most useless, most hateful, and fattest times. At this period of his life, not only was he a waste unable to cultivate, but as a man, had to relive being married off to another man. But he found that this man... was actually pretty good to him. This time, he will have revenge on those who wronged him, and pay off his debts to those who were kind to him.
description.zh: 乌若在死之前才看清身边众人的真面目，被他重视的朋友家族一直在利用他，而被他忽视的丈夫却在最后时刻赶来救他。上天怜悯让他重生了，重生在他最废、最憎恶、最胖的时光里。 此时的他，不但是个不能修炼的废物，作为男人，还被家族嫁给男人…… 重活一次，他发现男人原来对他还不错。 这一次，他要有仇报仇，有恩报恩。

title.en: I Killed the Player of the Academy

altTitles.en: I Killed an Academy Player

altTitles.es-la: Yo maté al jugador de la Academia

description.en:
One day, I was reincarnated the world of a game of Heroic Legend of Arhan as Corin Loch, a minor NPC, and joined hands with the game's protagonist, Park Si-ho, to save the world. 

However, as the story shifted, I accidentally found out his true nature - a murderous pervert who only wanted to accumulate experience points by hook or by crook! In order to save world peace, I killed him... and became the main character instead of him! 

What should I do in the future to bring the game to a perfect ending?
description.ko:
플레이어를 죽였다.
죽일 만한 놈이었다. 아주 X새끼였거든.

altTitles.ja: お忍び同棲

altTitles.en: Living With a Kunoichi

description.en: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

title.en: Aisare Tenshi na Classmate ga, Ore ni Dake Itazura ni Hohoemu

altTitles.ja: 愛され天使なクラスメイトが、俺にだけいたずらに微笑む

altTitles.en: The Classmate Who Is Adored by Everyone Smiles Teasingly Only at Me

altTitles.pt-br: A Colega de Classe que é Adorada Por Todos Sorri Provocativamente Apenas Para Mim

description.en:
Girls and sweets are full of secrets!? 

Ichise Souma is a high school student who dreams of becoming a pastry chef and devotes himself to making sweets. He meets Satomi Chika, a female classmate, after receiving some sweets. 

Chika is a beautiful girl with a soothing personality, known at school as the “Angel of Peace.” Souma thought she was a good girl who would kindly listen to his worries about making sweets, but... 

"Ichise-san, your embarrassed face is really cute." 

Chika shows an unexpected side of herself only when they are alone, and Souma’s heart is on the verge of exploding! A sweet and stimulating boy-meets-girl story with a mischievous angel connected by sweets begins!
description.ja:
パティシエになることを夢見てお菓子作りにはげむ高校生・市瀬颯真。
彼はお菓子の差し入れをきっかけに、クラスメイトの女子・里見千佳と出会う。
千佳は校内で“安らぎの天使”と呼ばれる癒し系の美少女。
颯真のお菓子作りの悩みも優しく聞いてくれるいい子、だと思っていたのだが――

「……市瀬さんの恥ずかしがる顔って、すごく可愛いんですね」

ふたりきりの時だけ意外な一面を見せてくる千佳に、颯真の心は爆発寸前！
お菓子が結ぶいたずらな天使との、甘くて刺激的なボーイ・ミーツ・ガール、開幕！
description.pt-br:
Meninas e doces estão cheios de segredos!? 

Ichise Souma é um estudante do ensino médio que sonha em ser confeiteiro e se dedica à confecção de doces. Ele conhece Satomi Chika, uma colega de classe, após receber alguns doces. 

Chika é uma linda garota com uma personalidade calmante, conhecida na escola como o “Anjo da Paz”. Souma achava que ela era uma boa garota que ouviria gentilmente suas preocupações sobre fazer doces, mas... 

"Ichise-san, seu rosto envergonhado é muito fofo." 

Chika mostra um lado inesperado de si mesma apenas quando estão sozinhos, e o coração de Souma está prestes a explodir! Começa uma doce e estimulante história de Garoto conhece Garota com um anjo travesso conectado por doces!

description.en:
This is a relaxing comedy manhua with cute penguins as the MCs. Some of them are shy, some are loveable, some are mischievous... But they all have short arms and legs with no waist. Even though it's not easy living in the Antarctic with its cold weather and slippery floors, they make do by catching fish, playing, and waiting for their happiness. 

"I'm very terrified, but if I love you enough, I'll find the courage to confess. If I can't get your response the first time, then I'll try a hundred times, a thousand times, even ten thousand times."

altTitles.ja: シガンバナ

description.en:
In this seemingly peaceful country, there lives a hitman that hunts down others of his kind - an assassin of assassins. Before eliminating his targets, he always questions their motives for killing - this is his way of embracing his destiny.

 From the author of "Until Your Bones Rot" and "The Shadows of Who We Once Were," Utsumi Yae presents a thrilling drama about the lives of those existing on the edge between life and death.

altTitles.en: Daily Chaldea

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

altTitles.en: Becoming a lazy arctic fox!

description.ru: Эта история о маленьком песце, который сунул свой любопытный носик туда куда не нужно было. И оказавшись запертым на космическом корабле песец...

altTitles.ja: 北の砦にて

altTitles.ja-ro: At the North Fort, Happy Days That I Spent With Everyone!

altTitles.id: Nama TerkaitDi Benteng Utara, Hari-hari Bahagia yang Aku Habiskan Bersama Semua Orang!

description.en:
Paw pads wrapped in white fur. Fluffiness around the neck. 
A bushy tail. A rounded figure that was the very definition of fur ball! 
A certain Japanese girl had been reincarnated into such a fox cub, Milfiria.
Milfiria was told to watch the house by her mother, as she left for the capital. 
However, unable to bear with the loneliness, she decided to follow her mother
but lost her way until she reached a fort protected by strong knights.

title.en: Damedol to Sekai ni Hitori Dake no Fan

altTitles.ja: ダメドルと世界に1人だけのファン

altTitles.ja-ro: Damedol to Sekai ni Hitori Dake no Fan

altTitles.en: The Useless Idol and Her Only Fan in the World
A Useless Idol and the Only Fan in the World

altTitles.id: Idol Gak Guna dan Penggemar Satu-satunya di Dunia

altTitles.es-la: Una Idol inútil y su único fan en el mundo

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Idol Inútil E Seu Único Fã No Mundo

altTitles.en: Damedol and the Only Fan in the World

description.en:
"Urumin" is an idol, but she can't sing or dance well, and she's got a dishonest character. Kimiya is the only fan in the world who likes her. The relationship between the two of them is a little different from the usual relationships between idols and fans! 

This is a "precious" love comedy that depicts the daily life of a bad idol and the man who keeps on promoting her, and the way he loves her!
description.ja: "うるみん"はアイドルなのに歌も踊りもダメダメで性格も素直じゃない。そんな彼女を推している世界で一人だけのファン、キミヤ。ふたりの関係性は普通のアイドル、ファンとの関係性と違ってちょっと変！？ダメなアイドルと彼女を推し続ける男の日常を描く、愛し方がすごい「尊い」系ラブコメディ！
description.pt-br: “Urumin” é uma idol, mas ela não consegue cantar nem dançar bem e não costuma ser sincera com seus reais sentimentos. “Kimiya” é seu único fã. A relação entre eles é um pouco diferente das relações normais entre fãs e ídolos! Esta é uma comédia romântica que retrata a vida diária de uma idol completamente desajeitada e o homem que continua a apoiá-la, demonstrando seu fanatismo até nos piores momentos!

title.en: The Male Lead's Boyfriend is Obsessed With Me

description.en:
I was transmigrated into a a dark and melodramatic BL novel.

Moreover, I became the villainess who was madly in love with the obsessive male lead, the boss of Baekcheon, and died in the first encounter with the main characters!

I thought about changing their love story, which ended with the death of my favourite schemer, into a happy ending!

"Let's go together, to my hell."

What? Did my favourite character just kidnap me?

"I like you,”'
“but this is too much.”

To ensure that the story unfolded just like it did the novel, I tried to seduce my favourite character just enough that he would hesitate to kill me.

"Why do you like me?"

But something feels off.

"Just try running away. That’s if you can, Princess."
"I’ve got my eyes on you right now, I'll go crazy if you do."

The male lead's boyfriend has started obsessing over me.

"Please, Yeonbyeol..."
"Don’t abandon me..."

So dangerous and dizzying, it's impossible to escape!
Unexpected endings, mind-blowing stories, so-cute-you-could-die hotpot ingredients... You'll laugh everyday until you get abs!
description.zh: 反转的剧情，开脑洞的故事，超萌火锅食材花样作死，每天逗你笑出腹肌！

altTitles.ja: かいじゅうの花束

description.en: New life love with a quirky guy she met at the share house she moved into, and the cohabitation romance begins....

altTitles.en: Always A Beginner Cat

altTitles.ja: ずっとネコ初心者

description.ja: ネコと暮らす不思議な日常。猫創作マンガ

title.en: When I Returned to My Hometown, My Childhood Friend was Broken

altTitles.ja-ro: Jimoto ni Kaettekitara Osananajimi ga Kowareteta

altTitles.ja: 地元に帰ってきたら幼馴染が壊れてた

altTitles.pt-br: Quando Voltei Para Minha Cidade Natal, Minha Amiga de Infância Estava Falida

altTitles.tr: Memleketime Döndüğümde Çocukluk Arkadaşım Paramparça Bir Durumdaydı

description.en:
When I was younger, one of my best friends was Kyouko. She was a brash and hotheaded young girl who, even though she was a tomboy, was still loved by her peers. 

To be honest, it’s been a few years since I came back home. The only person I know from there was Kyouko and she seems… different?
description.tr: Gençken en iyi arkadaşlarımdan biri Kyouko'ydu. Cesur ve atılgan bir genç kızdı; tomboy olmasına rağmen, arkadaşları tarafından seviliyordu. Dürüst olmak gerekirse, birkaç yıl sonra eve anca döndüm. Orada tanıdığım tek kişi Kyouko'ydu ve o sanki... biraz değişmişti?
description.pt-br:
Quando eu era mais jovem, uma das minhas melhores amigas era Kyouko. Ela era uma jovem impetuosa e cabeça quente que, embora fosse uma tomboy, ainda era amada por seus colegas.

Para ser sincero, já se passaram alguns anos desde que voltei para casa. A única pessoa que conheço de lá é Kyouko e ela parece... diferente?

altTitles.ja: 覇－LORD

description.en: The story is loosely based on the Three Kingdoms period, using both real and original characters and events from the historical period in Chinese history and folklore of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms.

altTitles.en: Prodigal Son of Xuanmen

description.en: This is a story about a prodigal son who, while squandering his money in various ways, beats up a group of destined men.

altTitles.ja: 少年のアビス

altTitles.en: World End Boy Meets Girl

description.en:
In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change, high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living. Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city. He thought he would "just" keep on living like that.

Until he met her.

Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead?

It's the start of a boy meets girl series which reflects the "now."
description.fr:
Dans une ville vide, au milieu d'une vie quotidienne répétitive, Reiji Kurose, lycéen, ne faisait que " vivre". 
Sa famille, ses rêves d'avenir, ses amis d'enfance. Tous ces éléments le liaient à cette ville. 
Il pensait qu'il continuerait "juste" à vivre jusqu'à la fin, jusqu'à ce qu'il la rencontre. 
Y a-t-il de l'espoir dans la vie ? Y a-t-il de la lumière dans l'avenir ? 
C'est le début d'une série de rencontres entre garçons et filles qui reflète le présent!
description.ru: В пустом городке, в разгаре своей повседневной жизни, казалось бы, "просто" жил старшеклассник Рэйдзи Куросе. Семья, мечты о будущем, друзья детства - все это привязывало его к своему родному городу. Он думал, что будет продолжать так жить и никогда ничего не изменит. Пока он не встретил ту самую. Есть ли надежда в жизни? Есть ли впереди свет? Это начало серии "мальчик, повстречавший девочку", которая отражает "сейчас".
description.tr: Reiji Kurose, hiçbir şeyin olmadığı ve görünüşe bakılırsa hiçbir değişimin de olmayacağı bir kasabada ot gibi yaşıyordu. Ailesi, gelecek hayalleri ve çocukluk arkadaşları... Hepsi onu o şehre zincirliyordu. Kendince böyle yaşar giderim diyordu. Taa ki onunla tanışıncaya dek. Yaşamanın bir manası var mı? Beni bekleyen bir gelecek var mı? Oğlan ve kızın tanışmasıyla trajedi kapıları aralanır...
description.vi: Một bộ truyện đầy u ám cùng tác giả với Hatsukoi Zombie. Trong một thị trấn nhàm chán và ngày qua ngày không có gì thay đổi, Reiji Kurose, một học sinh trung học vốn luôn "sống" như "đã chết". Gia đình, tương lai, bạn thời thơ ấu. Tất cả đều trói buộc cậu vào thị trấn này. Cậu luôn nghĩ bản thân đã "chết" cho đến khi gặp được cô gái ấy. Hy vọng nào thắp sáng cho cuộc đời tăm tối của hai người? câu chuyện về hành trình tìm đến "cái chết" để được "sống" chính thức bắt đầu.

altTitles.en: What is SCP?

altTitles.ja: SCPって何ですか？

description.en:
A request was sent to two manga artists, M and H, from the editorial department of the Ichijinsha comic HOWL.

"I would like you to create artwork based on the name (storyboard) for 'SCP,' which is popular on the internet. Additionally, I would like you to draw a manga that serves as an introduction to 'SCP."

The two accepted the project, but there were many unknowns about the original name.
While tilting his head in confusion, M — who is learning about SCP from H, who is knowledgeable about horror — continues to draw the manga.
M will be in charge of the introduction part, and H will handle the artwork for the original name part.

The most popular horror author on the web, Pear, returns to her roots.
A thought-provoking horror story that will surely help you understand what SCP is once you read it.
description.ja:
一迅社・comicHOWL編集部から二人の漫画家、MとHのもとに、依頼が届いた。

「インターネット上で人気の『SCP』についてのネーム原作を元に、作画してほしい」
「さらに、『SCP』について入門になる漫画を描いてほしい」

引き受けた二人だったが、そのネーム原作には不明の点が多い。
首を傾げながら、Mはホラーに詳しいHにSCPのことを教わりつつ、漫画を描いていく。
Mは入門のパートを担当し、そしてHは、ネーム原作パートの作画を担当する。

WEBホラーの最注目作家・梨、ついに原点回帰。
読めばSCPが何なのかきっとわかる、考察型ホラー。

title.en: Netoge no Yome ga Ninki Idol Datta: Cool kei no Kanojo wa Genjitsu demo Yome no Tsumori de Iru

altTitles.ja: ネトゲの嫁が人気アイドルだった件～クール系の彼女は現実でも嫁のつもりでいる～

altTitles.en: My Web Game Wife Is a Popular Idol IRL

altTitles.vi: Vợ trong game của tôi là Idol nổi tiếng ngoài đời

altTitles.ru: Моя жена в онлайн-игре – популярный айдол

altTitles.th: ไอดอลสาวสุดปังกับผมแต่งงานกันในเกมออนไลน์ ~(แต่) แฟนสาวสุดคูลอยากเป็นเจ้าสาวในโลกจริงด้วย~

altTitles.en: My Wife in the Web Game Is a Popular Idol

description.en: Kazuto Ayanokoji is an ordinary high school boy. He spends his days playing online games as a hobby. One day, he discovers the true identity of a friend who is so close to him that they are married in-game. It turns out to be a cool idol from the same class, Rinka Mizuki. As Rinka tries to act as his wife in real life, Kazuto is forced to lead a dizzying life.
description.ja: 平凡な男子高校生・綾小路和斗には嫁がいる。ただし趣味のネトゲ世界で。ところが結婚相手の少女リンの正体は、学校のクラスメイトで人気アイドルの『水樹凛香』で!? 正体がバレて関係も終わり――かと思いきや、凛香は現実でも和斗の「嫁」として振る舞い始めて……。
description.vi: Ayanokouji Kazuto là một cậu học sinh cao trung bình thường. Cậu có sở thích là chơi game vào thời gian rảnh của mình. Một ngày, cậu phát hiện ra danh tính thật của người bạn thân mà cậu đã kết hôn trong game. Người đó không ai khác chính là Rinka Mizuki, một idol và cũng là một người bạn cùng lớp của cậu. Trong khi Mizuki Rinka cố gắng để cư xử với cậu như một người vợ, cậu phải trải qua một cuộc sống hằng ngày mệt mỏi.

altTitles.en: Balad of Sword and Wine

description.en: During the Xiande period of the Dazhou dynasty, the Prince of Jianxing, Shen Wei, suffered defeat at the Chashi river in the northeast, leading to the Six Prefectures of Zhongbo almost falling to external foes. Shen Zechuan, meanwhile, was arrested and taken to the capital, to be the target of everyone's hatred as the surviving villain. When the young son of the Prince of Libei, Xiao Chiye, heard the news, he came and delivered a ruthless blow that nearly cost Shen Zechuan his life. Unexpectedly, the latter, who had seemed weak, was actually quite fierce, turning around and biting him, causing the former to bleed profusely. Henceforth, an enmity developed between the two, with the strife continuing both within and outside the court. Amidst this open and secret conflict, the true reason for Shen Wei's defeat was surprisingly discovered.

altTitles.ja: ミズダコちゃんからは逃げられない！

altTitles.en: You Can’t Escape From Mizudako-chan!

description.en:
Akigai Kanisuke is an ordinary high school boy. His daily life changes when Mizuda Yuuko (a.k.a. Mizudako-chan), a demi-human girl, transfers to his school.
A cute, mysterious, and slightly scary story begins!

altTitles.ja: エリオと電気人形

altTitles.en: Erio and electric doll

description.en: The story centers around Anjie, an electric doll, and Erio, a human raised by her. In order for Erio to experience the outside world, the two set out on a journey.

title.en: Gods of All People: I Sacrificed Hundreds of Millions of Living Beings To Become a God

altTitles.zh: 全民神祇：我献祭亿万生灵成神

altTitles.en: Spirit Sacrifice: The Path to Godhood
Everyone Is a King: I Sacrifice Countless Lives to Become a King

description.en:
Han Wu transmigrated to a world where everyone can become a god. He obtained the ability to sacrifice life.
At the beginning, he had a trash clan, so he sacrificed to change his fate against the heavens.
With no power, no status, and no money, he sacrificed his way to the top.
As long as he has enough followers, he can become infinitely stronger through sacrifice, becoming the main god, the god of gods!

title.en: Multiverse no Watashi, Koishite Ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: マルチバースの私、恋していいですか?

altTitles.en: Is It Alright for My Multiverse Self to Fall in Love?

description.en: No matter which universe you're in, my heart shall find its way to you.

title.en: Issho ni Kurashite ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: 一緒に暮らしていいですか？

altTitles.en: May I Live With You?

description.en: Hiromi Sonoda has no girlfriend, no job, and no home, until he finds a shared-house with very cheap rent and goes to check it out. However, the share-house has a certain condition... Kei Sasuga presents a new "Share House Romantic Comedy"!
description.fr:
Hiromi Sonoda n'a plus de petite amie, plus de travail et plus de maison, jusqu'à ce qu'il trouve une colocation au loyer très bon marché et qu'il aille la visiter. Cependant, la colocation est soumise à certaines conditions...
Kei Sasuga présente sa nouvelle "Share House Romantic Comedy" !
description.id: Hiromi Sonoda tidak punya pacar, tidak punya pekerjaan, dan tidak punya rumah, sampai dia menemukan rumah kos-kosan dengan harga sewa yang sangat murah dan pergi untuk melihatnya. Namun, rumah kos-kosan memiliki syarat tertentu... Kei Sasuga menghadirkan "Komedi Romantis Rumah Kos-kosan" baru!
description.ja: 「幸せな家庭」を夢見る園田寛美は、職を失い同棲中の彼女に振られて、家ナシ金ナシ彼女ナシに…。そんなときに、間違えて入居したのが、なんと女性専用シェアハウスだった!!
description.pt-br: Hiromi é um homem que sempre sonhou em ter uma família calorosa e amorosa por causa de um incidente em seu passado. Entretanto, depois que sua namorada terminou com ele por várias razões, ele começa a desistir de seu sonho e pensa que nunca será capaz de realizá-lo. Sem um lugar para viver, ele chega a uma casa compartilhada cheia de mulheres. Será que ele vai encontrar o lar e a família que ele almeja neste novo lugar?

altTitles.zh: 说谎的小狗会被吃掉的

description.en: The puppy is clearly an omnivore, then why does he have to pretend to be a carnivore? On his first day transferring into a new school, his secret was discovered by his fox classmate. Then begins his life of living under “threat”, but after spending more time with him, the fox isn’t actually too awful…?

altTitles.ja: キン肉マンジャンプ

altTitles.en: Kinnikuman special Weekly Shonen Jump Issues
Kinnikuman Jump Vol.1 Top 10 best Perfect Origins fights.
Kinnikuman Jump vol.2 Five Fated of Princess Biographies.
Kinnikuman Jump vol.3 2019's Choujin Popularity Poll.
Kinnikuman Jump vol.4 40th Anniversary of The Anime Broadcast.
Kinnikuman Jump vol.5 45th Anniversary of Kinnikuman

description.en: Special Weekly Shonen Jump issues dedicated to celebrate the Kinnikuman series

altTitles.en: Queen's Palace

description.en: Super sweet and super-sand sculptured female statue against the harem! I often hear: "Three princes and three princesses! Your puppets are fighting again!" The overbearing female CEO traversed to the world of female honors and woke up with seven husbands.

[An alpha who has lost his memory X A beta who appears strong outside, but soft inside]

On that day, as usual, we celebrated our 7th anniversary together, but it was also the day I lost my beloved lover.

Shinhoo and Hyunjae were a couple who had never fought for 7 years. Then one day, Shinhoo was suddenly involved in a car accident and all the memories he had were lost in an instant.

"I don't like betas."
"So, let's break up."

Now Hyunjae has lost everything he has.

"What should I do?"

title.en: Sensei! Bokutachi ga Sekai wo Horoboshimasu.

altTitles.ja: 先生！ 僕たちが世界を滅ぼします。

altTitles.en: Teacher, we will destroy the world!
The strongest Assassin as a Teacher

description.en:
A "Teacher" has a sacred job that protects and guides students.

In this world where people who can use magic and people who cannot use magic coexist, Solo is a sorcerer who lives alone.
He is also known as No. 0, a skilled assassin who always completes any request he receives.

"As part of a certain mission, I am assigned to teach at a magic school, and the teenagers I am assigned to teach are the students of the Class 2D, which is made up of dropouts."

While he is desperately playing the role of a teacher in order to complete his mission, a transfer student arrives and the situation takes an unexpected turn...

A school fantasy unfolding between a false teacher and the strongest assassin and the most evil students who serve as his "beacon"!
description.ja:
『教師』とは、生徒を守り、教え導く聖なる仕事。
魔法が使える人間と使えない人間が混在するこの世界で、孤独に生きる一人の魔導士・ソロ。
受けた依頼は必ず完遂するという凄腕の殺し屋・No.0（ナンバーゼロ）という異名も持つ彼は、
とある任務の一件で魔法学校で教師をすることになりますが、そこで担任することになったのは、学年の落ちこぼれが集まる２年Ｄ組。
任務遂行のために必死に教師を演じている最中、そこに転校生がやってきて事態は思わぬ方向に…。
偽りの教師で最強の暗殺者と、彼の“標”となる最凶の生徒たちが繰り広げる学園ファンタジー！

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.
